TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract NavigationGroups implements class Microsoft.Office.Interop.Outlook._NavigationGroups, class Microsoft.Office.Interop.Outlook.NavigationGroupsEvents_12_Event

Docs.summary: Contains a set of objects that represent the navigation groups displayed by a navigation module in the Navigation Pane.

remarks.para: This is a .NET interface derived from a COM coclass that is required by managed code for interoperability with the corresponding COM object. Use this derived interface to access all method, property, and event members of the COM object. However, if a method or event you want to use shares the same name under the same COM object, cast to the corresponding primary interface to call the method, and cast to the latest events interface to connect to the event. Refer to this topic for information about the COM object. For information about the method and property members of the COM object, see . For information about the event members of the COM object, see .
Use the property of the parent navigation module, such as a object, to return a NavigationGroups object.

Use the method to create a new NavigationGroup object and add it to the collection. Use the property (this in C#) to retrieve a NavigationGroup object from the collection. Use the method of the NavigationGroups collection to create a new NavigationGroup object.
Use the to return the default navigation group for a specified group type.
